class.name: AnimationNodeBlendTree
class.brief_description: A sub-tree of many type [AnimationNode]s used for complex animations. Used by [AnimationTree].
class.description: This animation node may contain a sub-tree of any other type animation nodes, such as [AnimationNodeTransition], [AnimationNodeBlend2], [AnimationNodeBlend3], [AnimationNodeOneShot], etc. This is one of the most commonly used animation node roots. An [AnimationNodeOutput] node named [code]output[/code] is created by default.

method.name: add_node
method.description: Adds an [AnimationNode] at the given [param position]. The [param name] is used to identify the created sub animation node later.

method.name: connect_node
method.description: Connects the output of an [AnimationNode] as input for another [AnimationNode], at the input port specified by [param input_index].

method.name: disconnect_node
method.description: Disconnects the animation node connected to the specified input.

method.name: get_node
method.description: Returns the sub animation node with the specified [param name].

method.name: get_node_position
method.description: Returns the position of the sub animation node with the specified [param name].

method.name: has_node
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a sub animation node with specified [param name] exists.

method.name: rename_node
method.description: Changes the name of a sub animation node.

method.name: set_node_position
method.description: Modifies the position of a sub animation node.

members.member: The global offset of all sub animation nodes.

signal.name: node_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the input port information is changed.

constants.constant: The specified input port is out of range.
Input and output nodes are the same.
